Texts.Chs: 其内描写了制作一把威力残虐的法杖的一些事宜。
Texts.Eng: Instructions on constructing a fell staff

Texts.Chs: 新教徒们，永远不要让你的武器离身。这把法杖对于你们而言是最棒的，没有什么能与之相比。你需要一本远古之书，两个沃尔坦核心和一个远古半身像。
Texts.Eng: Never be without your implements, young apprentice. The staff is your most favored good, and without it you are but meat to the Elder ones. You must fashion it from an Elder Tome, a Valtan Casing and an Elder Bust...
